# UILetterformAwareSizingRule.typographic

**Case**

Standard typographic bounds-sizing behavior, which may clip oversize characters.

## Declaration

```swift
case typographic
```

## Setting bounds-sizing behavior

- **UILetterformAwareSizingRule.oversize**: Bounds-sizing behavior that displays oversize characters fully but may negatively impact typographic alignment.

items.description: Bounds-sizing behavior that displays oversize characters fully but may negatively impact typographic alignment.
